abilities.name: Shuriken Flurry
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Haze Slash
attacks.effect: You may shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Shadowy Hunter-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 130 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
